panel.title: ILS Automation Installer for EMC Ignition Applications
panel.preamble: Welcome to the ILS Automation installer for EMC Ignition Applications. The table below compares the existing installation of this product, if any, with the versions contained in this new installation.

panel.title: End User License Agreement (EULA)
panel.preamble: Click on the button below to view the license that specifies permissible use of the software to be installed. Select the checkbox to indicate acceptance of the terms.

panel.title: Archive into an Ignition Backup
panel.preamble: This is an optional step. Once created, a backup allows you to revert the previous state of the application.

panel.title: Install a New XOM Project or Merge Changes into an Existing Project
panel.preamble: If an existing XOM project is selected, then execution of this step will merge updates creating a new version of that project. The existing project will not be changed. If there is not an existing project, then a new project will be created.

panel.title: Install Custom Modules
panel.preamble: This step installs modules necessary for the EMC applications.

panel.title: Update Toolkit Properties
panel.preamble: Set properties in the internal database of the Gateway. These particular parameters define extension functions that update the database in response to operator operations on diagrams.

panel.title: Installation Complete
panel.preamble: Record the current version of EMC Ignition Applications in the Gateway internal database.
